QuestData.Title: Gather Rot Blossoms
QuestData.Description: If you bring me some rot blossoms then I can brew you up a batch of zombie juice.$B$BRot blossoms grow in strange places. They tend to flourish on dead things, and Duskwood has its fair share of those!$B$BI've seen a few of them growing at Tranquil Gardens Cemetery lately. Check near the graves... but mind the dead that are walking about near there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 5 Rot Blossoms from Tranquil Gardens Cemetery.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hi, $n. Do you have those rot blossoms for me yet?
QuestData.RewardText: Good, you got the rot blossoms.$B$BI'll whip up the zombie juice... it's strong stuff, I warn you.
